verses.name: Revelation 19:5
verses.text: And a voice came out of the throne, saying, Praise our God, all ye his servants, and ye that fear him, both small and great.

verses.name: Revelation 19:6
verses.text: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.

verses.name: Revelation 19:7
verses.text: Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honour to him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready.
